value.title: CNBC mocked for report on approval rating for China's COVID-19 response
value.excerpt: CNBC published an article touting a poll indicating that China's government had received the highest approval rating from its own citizens for the way it handled the outbreak. The article features results from the "Global Crisis Perceptions" index from Toluna and Blackbox Research.

images.title: CNBC mocked for report on approval rating for China's COVID-19 response

value.title: The real scandal isn’t what China did to us. It’s what we did to ourselves.
value.excerpt: But as human civilization expands — building roads, clearing farmland, constructing factories, excavating mines — we are also destroying the natural habitat of wild animals, bringing them closer and closer to us.

images.title: The real scandal isn’t what China did to us. It’s what we did to ourselves.

value.title: WeChat users outside China face surveillance while training censorship algorithms
value.excerpt: Such practices are the antithesis of the responsible social media management that users should expect, especially during a pandemic.

images.title: WeChat users outside China face surveillance while training censorship algorithms

value.title: Don’t Start a New Cold War With China
value.excerpt: Beijing poses some real challenges, but the most formidable threats the U.S. now faces are transnational problems like the coronavirus

images.title: Don’t Start a New Cold War With China

value.title: New map highlights China's export-driven CO2 emissions
value.excerpt: China produces a whole lot of stuff -- stuff that gets bought by the rest of the world. In 2019, China exported approximately $2.5 trillion dollars worth of goods.

images.title: New map highlights China's export-driven CO2 emissions

value.title: China uses New Jersey mayor's claim he had coronavirus in November in propaganda war against US
value.excerpt: China on Thursday seized on comments made by a New Jersey mayor that he had contracted the novel coronavirus as early as November - a claim, that if true, would throw the U.S. and Beijing's timelines about COVID-19 into disarray.

images.title: China uses New Jersey mayor's claim he had coronavirus in November in propaganda war against US

value.title: U.S.-China tensions hurting global coronavirus response: EU diplomat
value.excerpt: Increasing tensions between the U.S.

images.title: U.S.-China tensions hurting global coronavirus response: EU diplomat

value.title: E.U. defends handling of China relations after Beijing censors op-ed by bloc’s ambassadors
value.excerpt: European Union officials on Thursday defended their handling of relations with China during the coronavirus pandemic, a day after the E.U. ambassador to China allowed an opinion article about E.U.-Chinese relations that he co-wrote to be censored before publication in a state-run newspaper.

images.title: E.U. defends handling of China relations after Beijing censors op-ed by bloc’s ambassadors

value.title: China Says It Contained COVID-19. Now It Fights To Control The Story
value.excerpt: The Communist Party says authorities acted swiftly and efficiently to contain the coronavirus outbreak. Officials are working to silence those suspected of challenging the narrative.

images.title: China Says It Contained COVID-19. Now It Fights To Control The Story

value.title: House Republicans to launch China Task Force amid growing scrutiny over coronavirus response
value.excerpt: House Republicans on Thursday will launch a “China Task Force” to coordinate a strategy against the geopolitical threat from Beijing, sources confirmed to Fox News -- coming amid global scrutiny over China’s handling of the coronavirus outbreak.

images.title: House Republicans to launch China Task Force amid growing scrutiny over coronavirus response

value.title: China's EU Ambassador Urges Europe to Agree to New Economic Ties Despite Calls for Coronavirus Probe
value.excerpt: China diplomatic and economic ties are even more important given the turmoil wrought by the coronavirus pandemic.

value.title: When Trump covered for China’s alleged coronavirus coverup
value.excerpt: A new revelation fills out the picture of a president unwilling to call out China in the early days of the outbreak.

images.title: When Trump covered for China’s alleged coronavirus coverup

value.title: China Trade Data Lifts Futures Ahead of Jobless Claims
value.excerpt: U.S. stock index futures jumped on Thursday as a surprise rise in Chinese exports spurred hopes of a faster economic recovery, even as investors braced for data likely to show millions more Americans filed for unemployment benefits last week.

images.title: China Trade Data Lifts Futures Ahead of Jobless Claims

value.title: Coronavirus Cover-Up: China Threatens, Silences Family Members Of COVID-19 Victims
value.excerpt: Beijing is facing pressure from the international community to allow an independent investigation into the origins of the virus, as well as the country's early response efforts.

images.title: Coronavirus Cover-Up: China Threatens, Silences Family Members Of COVID-19 Victims

value.title: Global shares mixed as China exports rise, outlook uncertain
value.excerpt: European shares have opened higher after China reported its exports rose 3.5% in April from a year earlier as its factories and supply chains revived after pandemic shutdowns. France’s CAC 40 gained 0.

images.title: Global shares mixed as China exports rise, outlook uncertain

value.title: Hong Kong stocks fall on weak confidence, as US-China tension and coronavirus toll weigh on sentiment
value.excerpt: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing, or HKEX, was the top loser among blue chips, as chief executive Charles Li Xiaojia said he will not seek reappointment next year and the stock market operator announced a 13 per cent decline in net profit in the first quarter.

images.title: Hong Kong stocks fall on weak confidence, as US-China tension and coronavirus toll weigh on sentiment

value.title: China April rare earth exports fall as coronavirus threatens global demand
value.excerpt: China's rare earth exports fell 22.2% month-on-month in April, customs data showed on Thursday, easing from a spike in March that saw ports clear shipments held up by coronavirus-related curbs on transport and as the pandemic hits overseas demand.

images.title: China April rare earth exports fall as coronavirus threatens global demand

value.title: China says supports WHO, opposes U.S., others trying to politicise COVID-19
value.excerpt: China said on Thursday it supports World Health Organization efforts to investigate the origin of the COVID-19 pandemic, and opposes attempts by the United States and some other countries to politicise the issue and attack Beijing.

images.title: China says supports WHO, opposes U.S., others trying to politicise COVID-19

value.title: China Counters Coronavirus Crunch With Surprise Rise in Exports
value.excerpt: Chinese exports rose unexpectedly in April, bucking a pandemic-induced economic slump that has crimped demand and disrupted supply chains world-wide.

images.title: China Counters Coronavirus Crunch With Surprise Rise in Exports

value.title: EU Ambassador to China Says Rising Sino-U.S. Tensions Not Helpful
value.excerpt: U.S. tension is problematic and undermines the broad multinational cooperation needed to deal with the coronavirus pandemic, the European Union's ambassador to China said on Thursday.

images.title: EU Ambassador to China Says Rising Sino-U.S. Tensions Not Helpful

value.title: China exports rebound in April but more weakness ahead
value.excerpt: China’s exports rebounded in April to rise 3.5% over a year earlier, but forecasters warned that strength is unlikely to last as the coronavirus pandemic depresses global consumer demand

images.title: China exports rebound in April but more weakness ahead

value.title: The Latest: China touts assistance to fighting coronavirus
value.excerpt: China is touting its assistance to countries struck by the coronavirus, saying it has provided direct government aid to 150 nations, including millions of testing kits

images.title: The Latest: China touts assistance to fighting coronavirus

value.title: China's April Exports Unexpectedly Rise but Outlook Still Grim
value.excerpt: China's exports unexpectedly rose in April for the first time this year as factories raced to make up for lost sales due to the coronavirus shock, but a double-digit fall in imports signals more trouble ahead as the global economy sinks into recession.

images.title: China's April Exports Unexpectedly Rise but Outlook Still Grim

value.title: Shanghai Disneyland to Reopen Amid Drop in New COVID-19 Cases in China
value.excerpt: Shanghai Disneyland will reopen to guests next week after closing for more than three months due to COVID-19, according to news reports.

images.title: Shanghai Disneyland to Reopen Amid Drop in New COVID-19 Cases in China

value.title: Pompeo blames China for lives lost to COVID-19
value.excerpt: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo blamed China for the deaths of hundreds of thousands of people worldwide from the coronavirus on Wednesday and renewed demands for the Asian nation to reveal its COVID-19 information.

images.title: Pompeo blames China for lives lost to COVID-19

value.title: EU’s pivot to China falls foul of Beijing’s censors
value.excerpt: Europe's diplomatic push to pivot to China amid the coronavirus epidemic has backfired, after an open letter calling for warmer ties with Beijing fell foul of Chinese censors. China Daily, the mouthpiece of the country's ruling Communist Party,

images.title: EU’s pivot to China falls foul of Beijing’s censors

value.title: China's Hubei reports no increase in Covid-19 cases for 33 consecutive days
value.excerpt: No new confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus disease (Covid-19) were reported in central China's Hubei Province for Wednesday, the provincial health commission said on Thursday (May 7).

images.title: China's Hubei reports no increase in Covid-19 cases for 33 consecutive days

value.title: Are Beijing’s bold moves in the South China Sea mere opportunism amid Covid-19 or the new normal?
value.excerpt: China’s renewed assertiveness may be driven by both domestic and external factors as Beijing seeks to bolster support at home for its tough security stance, while showing rival claimants and the US that maritime and sovereignty issues will not be sidelined amid the pandemic.

images.title: Are Beijing’s bold moves in the South China Sea mere opportunism amid Covid-19 or the new normal?

value.title: China reports two new coronavirus cases, both imported
value.excerpt: China reported two new coronavirus cases for May 6, unchanged from the same number of increases the day before, data from the national health authority showed on Thursday.

images.title: China reports two new coronavirus cases, both imported

value.title: Coronavirus live news: Trump says Covid-19 task force to continue 'indefinitely' as US-China rift widens
value.excerpt: China relationship one of ‘disappointment and frustration’; eurozone’s future threatened; Spain extends state of emergency. Follow the latest updates
